No idea who needs to see this but
I had created a workout routine with this video.

First verse: High leg raise / leg shuffle + hand movements
Second verse: Butt kicks / Fast squats
Chorus: Jumping Jacks

I felt unmotivated to exercise but I like club vibes. I treat it as I am clubbing.
Feel free to put any form of exercise in there u want. Aim for +1 song duration per day (1 song first day, 2 songs second day, etc.) Can't take it? Maintain the number of repeat for that day on and see how it goes.

Rmb to drink water and stretch before and after. Stay safe.
